testimonials.name: Ayabule Sityata
testimonials.message: Siya is such a focused individual, very helpful and mindful. Has a great personality, he is very bubbly

testimonials.name: Uthmaan Samsodien
testimonials.message: It's always a pleasure to work with Siyamthanda. He has an infectious personality and he always brings out the best in others. He motivates everyone around him and he's always ready to offer a helping hand to anybody when needed. He has a go getter mindset that he applies himself to and does his best to achieve what he wants. I would definitely recommend him.

testimonials.name: What say
testimonials.message: Siyamthanda is always pantcual and is respectful. When it comes to the work he always makes sure that everything is done and goes the extra mile.
